Others: Bosnia and Herzegovina and Hungary face off on Monday in UEFA Nations League action at Bilino Polje Stadium.
The UEFA Nations League has gotten off to a thrilling start with the first couple matchdays of the 2024 edition.
Reigning champion Spain was unable to break the deadlock against a formidable Serbian national team.
Spain bounced back on matchday two to take a dominant 4-1 victory.
Last yearâ€™s runner-up France also got off on the wrong foot on matchday one, losing to fellow powerhouse Italy 3-1.
Portugal looks like an early favorite after winning both of their matches in September.
The action continues on Monday when Bosnia and Herzegovina and Hungary face off at Bilino Polje Stadium to continue matchday four of the competition.
